extensionDescription.message: Le contentores multi-conto te adjuta a mantener tote le partes de tu vita in linea continite in schedas differente. Etiquettas personalisate e schedas a codice de color adjuta a tener separate le differente activitates, como: compras in linea, planification de viages o lectura de e-mail de labor.
extensionDescription.description: Description of the extension. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Multi-Account Containers".

openNewTabInThisContainer.message: Aperir nove scheda in iste contentor

openTabs.description: Section title for tabs that are currently open in that container

moveTabsToANewWindow.message: Mover schedas a un nove fenestra

onboarding-1-header.message: Un maniera melior pro gerer tote le cosas que tu face online

onboarding-1-description.message: Usa contentores pro organisar activitates, gerer contos e concentrar te sur lo que tu vole.

onboarding-2-description.message: Functiones como codices de color e schedas contentor separate te adjuta a trovar facilemente le cosas, a concentrar tu attention e a minimisar le distractiones.

onboarding-3-header.message: Un loco pro cata cosa, e cata cosa in su loco.

onboarding-3-description.message: Comencia con le contentores que nos ha create, o crea le tues.

onboarding-4-header.message: Sempre aperi sitos in le contentores que tu vole.

onboarding-4-description.message: Clicca con le button dextre intra un scheda contentor pro facer que le sito sempre se aperi in ille contentor.

onboarding-5-header.message: Schedas contentor quando tu ha besonio de illos.

onboarding-5-description.message: Preme longemente le button Nove Scheda pro crear un nove scheda contentor.

onboarding-6-header.message: Le synchronisation de contentores es ora disponibile!

onboarding-6-description-2.message: Activa le synchronisation pro compartir le contentores e lor sitos assignate con qualcunque computator connexe a tu conto.

onboarding-7-header-2.message: Un conto es necesse pro synchronisar.

onboarding-7-description-2.message: Clicca Authenticar se, pro confirmar que tu conto es active.

onboarding-8-description.message: Ora le contentores pote integrar se con Mozilla VPN o con tu proprie proxy pro crear un connexion secur e private que protege tu activitate.

spreadTheWord.message: Si tu apprecia le contentores, adjuta nos a diffunder le parola!

removeThisContainerConfirmation.message: Desira tu vermente remover iste contentor?

info.description: Alternative text for the i icon in the toolbar icon pop-up

openThisSiteConfirmation.message: Aperir iste sito in tu contentor assignate?

wouldYouStillLikeToOpenConfirmation.message: Vole tu ancora aperir iste sito in le contentor actual?

rememberMyDecision.message: Rememorar mi decision pro iste sito

onboardingToggle.message: Mutar isto pro revider le quadros de introduction.

enableBookMarkMenusDescription.message: Iste parametro te permitte aperir un marcapagina o un dossier de marcapaginas in un contentor.

enableSyncDescription.message: Iste parametro te permitte synchronisar tu contentores e lor sitos assignate inter apparatos.

syncExcludeDescription.message: Excluder le synchronisation del containers quando lor nomine non concorda le expression regular specificate insensibile al majusculas.

replaceTab.message: Replaciar le scheda in vice del creation de un nove

replaceTabDescription.message: Reimplaciar le scheda actual si se aperi un pagina que es assignate a un altere contentor (in vice de mantener aperte le scheda active). Isto non influentia le apertura de schedas con le button medie del mouse.

editWhichContainer.message: Modificar qual contentor se aperi quando on usa le accessos directe numerate.

keyboardShortCut.message: Le contentor a aperir con le clave de accesso directe $keyId$

confirmNavigationTitle.description: This is the title of a confirmation page. Please do not translate "Multi-Account Containers".

openInNoContainer.description: This is the button text in confirmation page when we are not inside a container

youAskedFirefox.message: Tu ha demandate a Firefox de sempre aperir $containerName$ pro iste sito:

chooseLocation.description: Location refers to the geographical position used by the VPN

protectYourContainers.message: Proteger tu contentores con Mozilla VPN

protectThisContainer.message: Proteger iste contentor con Mozilla VPN

useCustomLocation.message: Usar un position personalisate pro iste contentor

mozillaVpnMustBeOn.message: Mozilla VPN debe esser active pro usar iste functionalitate.

proxyNowAvailable.message: Ora con Mozilla VPN e parametros del servitor proxy avantiate

tooltipWarning.message: Iste contentor es configurate pro usar un proxy de Mozilla VPN, ma Mozilla VPN non es active. Activa Mozilla VPN pro usar iste contentor.

integratewithmozillavpn.message: Integra tu contentores con Mozilla VPN

mozillaVpnAndProxyPermissionsTitle.message: Mozilla VPN e permissiones del proxy

nativeMessagingPermissionTitle.message: Premitte al extension de excambiar messages con programmas differente de Firefox

nativeMessagingPermissionDescription.message: Iste parametros permitte al extension de excambiar messages con le cliente de Mozilla VPN e es necessari pro facer functionar le integration de Mozilla VPN.
nativeMessagingPermissionDescription.description: 'This setting' refers to the permission indicated in nativeMessagingPermissionTitle

proxyPermissionTitle.message: Premitte al extension de controlar le parametros del proxy

proxyPermissionDescription.message: Isto te permitte de usar le parametros de proxy avantiate e de activar le functionalitates de integration de Mozilla VPN.
proxyPermissionDescription.description: 'This' refers to the permission indicated in proxyPermissionTitle

additionalPermissionNeeded.message: Iste functionalitate require un altere permission pro functionar. Le permissiones pote esser disactivate sempre ab le pagina del parametros.
additionalPermissionNeeded.description: 'This feature' is the browser proxy permission. This string appears on the 'Advanced Proxy Settings' panel when the proxy permission is disabled.

mozillaVpnRequiresAdditionalPermissions.message: Le integration con Mozilla VPN pro functionar require un abonamento e permissiones additional.

integrateContainers.message: Integra tu contentores con Mozilla VPN

theme.description: Theme section title in the option page

themeAuto.description: Default value for the theme option select tag

themeLight.description: Value for the theme option select tag

themeDark.description: Value for the theme option select tag

filterInputLabel.message: Filtrar le lista de contentores per nomine:
filterInputLabel.description: Label for the filter input in the main panel. Only visible for screen reader.

imageAltContainerInfo.description: Alt text for right-arrow button to view container info

defaultContainerLabel.description: The title of the default container

openContainerPanel.description: Label for option in the keyboard shortcut manager (associating a shortcut to open the container panel)

containerShortcut.description: Label for option in the keyboard shortcut manager. $keyId$ is a number from 1 to 10.

openBookmarkInContainerTab.message: Aperir marcapagina in un scheda contentor

clearSiteCookiesTooltipInfo.description: Label for hovering of the refresh button in a containers site manager

deleteSiteTooltipInfo.description: Label for hovering of the trash button in a containers site manager

clearContainerStorage.description: Label for the clearing a containers storage and cache option

cookiesClearedSuccess.message: Le cookies pro $siteName$ era clarate con successo
cookiesClearedSuccess.description: Label to confirm that cookies were cleared in the site manager

cookiesCouldNotBeCleared.message: Le cookies non poteva esser vacuate pro $siteName$
cookiesCouldNotBeCleared.description: Error message that shows if cookies could not be cleared in the site manager

storageWasClearedConfirmation.message: Le immagazinage e le cookies de $containerName$ era vacuate.
storageWasClearedConfirmation.description: The confirmation label that a containers storage was cleared successfully.
